attributes.action: censure Lord Ahmed for threatening to mobilise a Muslim blockade of the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Such an action is surely at odds with his role as a member of a British House of Parliament, and is in itself an incitement to unrest.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
